metadata.name: Chloe Kim #1
metadata.description:
Chloe Kim is an American snowboarder who is now cemented as the female face of both snowboarding and action sports after the 2018 Winter Olympics, where at the age of 17 she became the youngest woman to win a Olympic snowboarding gold medal.



Hometown: Torrance, CA, USA

Birthdate: 4/23/2000



Career highlights include:

PyeongChang 2018 Olympic Winter Games, gold(halfpipe)

Lillehammer 2016 Youth Olympic Winter Games, gold (halfpipe, slopestyle)

2017 FIS World Cup Standings, 1st (halfpipe), 6th (overall)

2017 X Games Aspen, bronze (superpipe)

2016 FIS World Cup Standings, 3rd (halfpipe), 7th (overall)

2016 X Games Aspen, gold (superpipe)

2016 X Games Oslo, gold (superpipe)

2015 X Games Aspen, gold (superpipe)

2014 X Games Aspen, silver (superpipe)

Became the only athlete in X Games history to earn three gold medals before the age of 16
